name: Slotpark Slots & Casino Games
description:
The best Novoline games!
Welcome to the Slotpark game universe!

Features at a glance:

You are looking for sizzling Las Vegas vibes, groundbreaking slots and stunning winning chances all wrapped up in an App? Then look no further because all this and much more is available on Slotpark!

Embark on your adventure now in the #1 Casino for online slots and enjoy gaming fun 24 hours a day, 7 days a week wherever you are!

Please note that
- Slotpark is a platform for online gambling, created for entertainment purposes only.
- It is not possible to win cash or items/services/presents or other goods on our slot machines.
- The virtual currency used in the games is called ‘Slotpark Dollar’. It can be purchased in the shop using real money.
- Slotpark Dollar cannot be converted back into real money or withdrawn in any way.
- Slotpark Dollar can only be used for playing games on Slotpark.
- The games are intended exclusively for users aged 18 years or older.
